About Me

Let me briefly introduce myself

HELLO

I'm Samir, an aspiring front-end developer.

I have done some of the projects in my past experience using different set of technologies, to create structure, styling and functionality and bringing projects into "life".
Feeling comfortable and excitement towards learning new things, solving problems and improving myself on daily basis, same as chatting and meeting new people with which i can share experience, and also learn/grow.

Besides passion for coding and technologies, i'm also a nature, sports, geography and video games lover, altogether with cosmopolity attitude.

Feel free to contact me and let's have a talk.

Techonoligies, languages and tools which i use (and learning):

HTML (5), CSS (3), Javascript, Bootstrap, jQuery, SASS, Git, Node.js (learning), React (learning), and GitHub.
